SUMINISTROS PESQUEROS Y ACUICOLAS

[Previous](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [Next](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#)

[1](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [2](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [3](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [4](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [5](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#) [6](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/home-4/#)

[![Layer 161](https://acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-160.png)](https://acuiculturaspya.com/fr/acuicultura-3/)

[AQUACULTURE](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/aquaculture/)

[![Layer 161](https://acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-168.png)](https://acuiculturaspya.com/cable-cadena-accesorios-inoxidables/)

[CABLE, CHAIN & ACCESSORIES](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/cable-chain-and-accessories/)

[![Layer 162](https://acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-162.png)](https://acuiculturaspya.com/canalizacion/)

[CANALIZATION](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/canalization/)

### QUALITY

![](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/Layer-156.png)

We choose homologated suppliers to ensure the quality of our products.

### GUARANTEE

![](https://acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-155.png)

The rapid response capacity makes us one of the referents in this sector.

### EXPERIENCE

![](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-157.png)

We support and we give service to the main companies belonging to the maritime, fisheries and aquaculture sectors.

### COMMITMENT

![](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-158.png)

Commitment and honesty with the market. We give solutions based on confidence and industrial know how.

# Origin and Experience.

The company have been founded in 1991 (Vigo – Spain).

In 1996, the company began to supply anchoring & mooring equipment and accessories for aquaculture farming, such as ropes, wires, **anchor**, **chain** and **buoys**.

Six years later, in 2003, the first **cages were built intended to the transport and fattening thon**, opening new international markets; the first one was Tunisia.

Lately, in 2006, we started the production of the first auxiliary boats for the **marine farms**.

Recently, in 2014, we installed the biggest **long-line** in the Iberian Peninsula meant to Oysters Production (Crassotrea Gigas). The production capacity is around 2000 Ton/year.

At this moment, the company is working in several international “turnkey” projects for **farming installations, intended to fattening thon** and other species.

We have a wide range of **naval hardware**: steel wire ropes, chains and all kind of inox accessories.

![](https://acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/Layer-159-copy-2.png)

# Fish Farming

- Our **floating cages** are built completely in 100% virgin polyethylene. This material is considered the best for marine applications because the good mechanical resistance, flexibility and duration.
- The welding of the pipe of these **cages for aquaculure** are made by thermofusion and its made by homologated welders with a long professional experience
- The **supports** (brackets), fabricated by Rotomoulding system, are designed to work in the most exigent environmental conditions, supporting the forces exercised on the cages when the heavy storms are. All the moulds are fabricated by us and we can produce supports for different pipe diameters: 200,250,280,315,400 mm.
- In spite of the round **cages** are the most commonly used, we make other geometric configurations (square, rectangular, hexagonal).

## CONSULT OUR PRODUCTS

### Detailed and actualized articles

[CATALOG](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/products-and-services/)

# ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS

[![Aquafuture Spain 2023](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Aquafuture-Spain-2023-378x250.jpg)](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/aquafuture-spain-2023-2/)

## [Aquafuture Spain 2023](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/aquafuture-spain-2023-2/)

Aquafuture Spain 2023 fair II International Show of the Aquaculture Industry From march 28 to 30 We wait for you! RECINTO F.I.G. – SILLEDA (PONTEVEDRA) STAND A-32

[![Salon Halieutis in Agadir (Morocco)](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Salon-Halieutis-Agadir-2023-Sector-Pesquero-Suministros-Pesqueros-y-Acuicolas-4-400x250.jpg)](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/salon-halieutis-agadir-morocco/)

## [Salon Halieutis in Agadir (Morocco)](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/salon-halieutis-agadir-morocco/)

During the 1st and 5th of February we have participated as exhibitors at the Salon Halieutis in Agadir Fair whose last edition was held in 2019 and which is already a reference in the fisheries and aquaculture sector in Morocco This has been our second participation...

[![Aquafuture Spain 2022 fair](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Aquafuture-Spain-2022-Suministros-Pesqueros-y-Acuicolas-2-400x250.jpg)](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/aquafuture-spain-2022-fair/)

## [Aquafuture Spain 2022 fair](https://www.acuiculturaspya.com/en/news/aquafuture-spain-2022-fair/)

Aquafuture Spain 2022 fair (Aquaculture) From march 23 to 25 We wait for you! RECINTO F.I.G. - SILLEDA (PONTEVEDRA) STANDS A83 - A84   \[button link="https://www.facebook.com/SuministrosPesquerosyacuicolas/videos/998687797458145/" type="big" color="lightblue"...\
